name: Convergence: Earthbreaker
description:
DISCLAIMER: THIS IS A DEMO BUILD THAT INCLUDES CONTENT THAT IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE IN FUTURE DEMOS AND FINAL RELEASES. THIS IS ALSO A FANGAME MADE SOLELY FOR ENTERTAINMENT PURPOSES THAT USES SPRITES AND MUSIC THAT I DO NOT OWN. I DO NOT ACCEPT ANY FORM OF DONATIONS OR PAYMENTS FOR THIS PROJECT. Earth 71319 Lundstadt, Ghelos Year Unknown

The region of Ghelos is in shambles. Creatures with the ability to infect and turn others have brought society to the brink of collapse. The governing council of Ghelos known as The Astral Order has been slaughtered, with what's left being taken control of by a robot known as Robo-Kuza. The robot aims to control all of Ghelos, and assures the region that this is an era of prosperity and salvation. The people, confused and frightened, comply. All but a few.

This one-chapter demo follows Sergeant Greasemixer and his allies as they seize the throne room of Ghelos' capital city, Lundstadt. Face off against Robo-Kuza and what remains of The Astral Order's militia, the Astral Corps, and find out if this is the end of a brutal era for Ghelos - or just the beginning.

Convergence: Earthbreaker Edition includes:

  • An easy to follow tutorial on the basic mechanics of strategy RPGs.
  • Selectable difficulties allowing for a flexible experience open to newcomers and tactical RPG veterans alike.
  • 7 different conversations between units that happen on the battlefield, revealing insight into their roles in the full game.
  • A slightly altered ending that changes based on the difficulty and units that survive.
  • An unlockable post-credit scene that ties into the full game.
